item.title: How to specify custom ssh key while git clone from github
Bluetooth keyboard does not connect automatically to laptop with Mac OS Sierra
item.description: Not sure if it started after upgrade to the latest version of MacOS Sierra 10.12, but I feel like so. My laptop loses connection to wireless keyboard very often and does not reconnect automatically. Turning on and off does not help. I tried to find an explanation and possible solution, and the only hint I found was to re-connect the keyboard. This is how you do it: Call Keyboard preferences window by typing in [CMD] +[Space] -> keyboard[
